title: Mental Health Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Sycamores (Los Angeles, CA) in Jul 2022
Interview Descriptions: Long wait to get initial interview.  Managers interviewing seemed nice.   Many programs within the agency to choose from and many sites.  Large company with a long history in LA county

title: Clinician Interview
Interview Descriptions: The interview was a fairly standard interview.... except for the fact that they sent me a letter telling me I did not get the job...and then offered me a position...was very telling of my experience there as an employee

title: Clinician Interview
Interview Descriptions: Easy questions. About experience and education. Why do you want to work with these clients. Do you have DMH experience. What populations have you worked with? How did you hear about the company.
Interview Questions: Past experience working with clients, education etc.

title: Youth Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Sycamores
Interview Descriptions: Very nice people who conducted the interview. They were sincere and honest on what is expected from new employees and the environment dealing with youth. They are good listeners too, so my advice for new employees is to be completely honest with your answers to questions.
Interview Questions: What ticks you off from a scale 1-10?

title: Senior Fianance Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Sycamores (Pasadena, CA) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Long but rewarding. Depeding on the CFO you go through several rounds. Afterwards youre hired. Only problem is that youll have to negotiate hard for your salary. Other than that. Great interview process and experience.
Interview Questions: Wy would you like to work here?

title: Mental Health Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Sycamores (Pasadena, CA) in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: I applied through their website and provided a resume at a job fair a month prior. I came in for an interview under the impression it would with 4 people but the person who contacted me was not in the meeting. It lasted about 40 mins and I left with a good impression, regardless if I am offered the job or not.
Interview Questions: Why should we hire you over the other candidates? Why did you choose to be a social worker?

title: Community Wellness Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Sycamores
Interview Descriptions: Went in for an interview with the main location of where I’d be working and they explained to me what the position was about and  then a few days later I had an interview with Human Resources.
Interview Questions: Why would you like to work with transitional age youth?

title: Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Sycamores (Covina, CA) in Jan 2018
Interview Descriptions: Good questions inquired into ability of accomplishing task and assignment within job description. Ultimately depends on ability to verbalize your experience and demonstrate your knowledge in the mental health field of work.

title: Mental Health Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Sycamores
Interview Descriptions: 2 part interview. One with HR, one with the site at which you will work. HR is really nice. Face to face interview focus more on clinical skills, identifying your strengths and weaknesses, how would you manage crisis situations, how you work outside the box with youth.
Interview Questions: How would you prioritize in an emergent situation?

title: Mental Health Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Sycamores (Pacoima, CA) in Nov 2016
Interview Descriptions: I had a panel interview that lasted 30 minutes and then was asked to diagnose a client based on symptoms and situation provided. I was then asked to complete a small activity in which I found strengths and weaknesses of an imaginary client by the way their home looked.
Interview Questions: Do you have experience with DMH paper work?

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Sycamores
Interview Descriptions: Simple process, applied online through their online jobs page. It took a couple of weeks for someone to call and arrange an interview with someone from human resources and then there was a second interview with the Director. After that then there was  apersonality test as well as drug screening. By this time though I had another interview and decided to take that posotion so withdrew my candidacy.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work at Hathaway-Sycamores

title: Mental Health Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Sycamores (Pasadena, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Interview with HR rep and then moved on to an interview with the director. I was given a personality test, drug screening, salary negotiation, sign on bonus, and 3 days later accepted the position.  The interview process was pretty painless, and the staff and director were welcoming and friendly. There were no tricky questions or difficult scenarios, no diagnosis or vignette tests. Very simple process.
Interview Questions: What interventions have you used that have proven successful?

title: Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Sycamores
Interview Descriptions:
took a long time to get a response.
i had to call and follow up with emails at least twice a week
Interview was easy and relevant to the position i was hired for. they didn't have me interview with the director i was going to work for which I came to find out why...total nut job!

title: Group Home Staff Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Sycamores (Altadena, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed by 2 staff at Residential facility,then Interviewed by Clinical Supervisor would then hire me.
Interview Questions: How do I feel about having a Woman as my Boss

title: Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Sycamores (Pasadena, CA) in Jun 2013
Interview Descriptions: HR hiring representative was fair and friendly. She asked whether I had received any other job offers, when I told her I had received five offers from other agencies, she told me that their pay, paid time off, and benefits were competitive. She was right, however, she didn't warn me that the upper level management were atrociously attacking their staff! I would have been way better off accepting a job offer at another facility!
Interview Questions: They assessed my Spanish speaking ability.

title: CWS Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Sycamores (Pasadena, CA) in Jan 2013
Interview Descriptions: It took forever, very disorganized HR department. The interviewer was pleasant and well manner. The cautions were very basic and not much to it. I guess they were trying to restructure their HR department.
Interview Questions: How long it took for us to contact you?
